TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrintStringProperty extends System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty
Public NotInheritable Class PrintStringProperty Inherits PrintProperty

summary.span: 表示打印系统硬件或软件组件的 属性（及其值）。

span.span: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此类在其属性与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态中安装第二个打印机不同。The following example shows how to use this class to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

summary.span: 为指定的属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`应拼写的某些特定的名称完全相同打印系统对象，包括大小写的属性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，属性对象必须拼写"提交"，而不是"提交"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter".

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类具有指定属性的指定值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified value for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`应拼写的某些特定的名称完全相同打印系统对象，包括大小写的属性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，属性对象必须拼写"提交"，而不是"提交"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "Submitter", not "submitter". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数要将不同另一台打印机安装在其属性与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态。The following example shows how to use this constructor to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]
